data.title: 484 La Vista Dr, Del Rio, TX 78840
data.meta_description: Zillow has 43 photos of this $410,000 4 beds, 3 baths, 2,422 Square Feet single family home located at 484 La Vista Dr, Del Rio, TX 78840 built in 2019. MLS #205802.
data.text: Welcome to 484 La Vista, your custom home in Lake Ridge Ranch. This residence features four bedrooms, two and a half bathrooms, an office, and an open floor plan for easy entertaining. The kitchen includes custom cabinets for efficient storage. Vaulted ceilings in the living room add a touch of luxury, complemented by abundant natural light. The primary suite offers a spacious walk-in shower and jetted tub for relaxation. Enjoy beautiful sunsets on the large covered patio with a view of the Sleepy Lady Mountains. The fully fenced property, complete with a remote gate, ensures privacy and security. Conveniently located near Lake Amistad and with easy access to Loop 79 for commuting or errands.
